titles.title: Bank Service Company Examination Coordination Act of 2023
Bank Service Company Examination Coordination Act of 2023
Bank Service Company Examination Coordination Act of 2023
To amend the Bank Service Company Act to provide improvements with respect to State banking agencies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 39 - 0.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Financial Services. H. Rept. 118-290.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 234.

committee.name: House Financial Services
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

bill.summary:
Bank Service Company Examination Coordination Act of 2023
This bill requires the coordination of state banking agencies with federal banking agencies in regulating and examining the activities of bank service companies. It also allows for the sharing of information related to examinations and regulations between federal and state agencies.
